$word_boundary = [-\ $];
$vowel = [aeijouw];       # Vowels and glides
$not_vowel = [^$vowel];
ð → | d;
ɣ → | g;
ŋ → | n;
θ → | s;
ɾ → | r;
ff → f ;
kk → k ;
mm → m ;
nn → n ;
pp → p ;
tt → t ;
tʧ → ʧ ;
aa → a ;
oi\u032F → oi ;
oo → o ;
uu → u ;
[^dgktx] { ei\u032F → e ;
[^-\ .$] { eu\u032F → eu ;
[^-\ .$] { ou\u032F → o;
[^j]     { ui → wi ;
[^$word_boundary] { m } [bp] → n;  # GB/T 17693.5-2009, 5.3.2
s[θs] → s;               # GB/T 17693.5-2009, 5.3.4
[^ʧ] { jo → io;          # GB/T 17693.5-2009 表 1, 注 7
::Null;
j } an $not_vowel → i ;  # GB/T 17693.5-2009 表 1, 注 8
[g.$] { wai\u032F → wai ;
wai\u032F → uai\u032F ;
[g.$] { wau\u032F → wau ;
wau\u032F → uau\u032F ;
jau\u032F → iau\u032F ;
[^jw] { ao } [^n]     → au\u032F ;
[^jw] { ao } n $vowel → au\u032F ;
::Null;
